mapper.select: SELECT QuestionId, UserEmail, UserType, CaseId FROM react_use.questionnaire_mails WHERE GUID = #{Id}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM react_use.questionnaire_mails as A WHERE A.QuestionId= #{questionId} and A.CaseId=#{caseId} and A.UserType=#{userType}

SELECT A.Description, A.Type, A.ActiveFlag, A.Order, A.RequireFlag FROM react_use.questionnaires as A WHERE A.PlatformId=#{platformId} and A.EffectiveDate > CURRENT_DATE() and A.Open=1 and A.ActiveFlag=1 and A.QuestionId=#{questionId} Order By A.Order ASC
